程序包 Vue

类 VueTexte

java.lang.Object
Vue.VueTexte
所有已实现的接口:
java.lang.Runnable, Observer
public class VueTexte
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer, java.lang.Runnable
The class VueTexte represents for the command line when playing with the graphic interface. It should be run at the same time with the thread of the graphic interface. So it implements the interface Runnable. It should be updated according to the changes happened in the observable class, so it implements the class Observer.
